data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Prior Intimation Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 29 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
S.J.S. Enterprises Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 08/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 1. The audited Standalone Financial Results of the Company as per Indian Accounting Standard (IND-AS) for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025.

2. The audited Consolidated Financial Results as per Indian Accounting Standard (IND-AS) for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025.

3. To consider and recommend final dividend if any for the financial year ended March 31 2025.

data.news_body: In continuation with the Company's letter dated August 01, 2022, pertaining to Intimation of schedule of Earnings call to be held on Friday, 5th August 2022 at 10:00 a.m. (IST) and pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the earnings presentation on the unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2022.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
In furtherance of our letter dated July 28, 2022, informing about the Board Meeting scheduled on August 04, 2022, the Board of Directors of S.J.S. Enterprises Limited ('the Company'), at the said meeting, has inter alia considered and approved the following
1. Financial results
2. Appointment of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
3. Amendment to Policies/Codes/Schemes

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
In furtherance of our letter dated July 28, 2022, informing about the Board Meeting scheduled on August 04, 2022, the Board of Directors of S.J.S. Enterprises Limited ('the Company'), at the said meeting, has inter alia considered and approved the following
1. Financial results
2. Appointment of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
3. Amendment to Policies/Codes/Schemes

data.caption: Submission Of Revised Half-Yearly Disclosure On Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23 (9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018.
data.news_body: We refer to the letter dated 04th June, 2022, filed with exchange we submitted the related party transactions disclosure with an inadvertent mistake.We are filing the revised disclosure on related party transactions pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018 for the period ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Submission Of Half Yearly Disclosure On Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23 (9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018.
data.news_body: Please find enclosed the disclosure on related party transactions pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018 for the period ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Please find enclosed the transcripts of the Analysts/Investor Meet/ Earnings Call of Q4 FY 2021-22 held on May 27, 2022.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please be informed that the Presentation and the audio recording of the Earnings call held on May 27, 2022, to discuss the financial results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 has been uploaded on the website of the Company at https://sjsindia.com/investors.html#financials.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: In continuation with the Company's letter dated May 19, 2022 pertaining to Intimation of schedule of Earnings call to be held on Friday, 27th May 2022 at 10:00 a.m. (IST) and pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the earnings presentation on the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2022.

data.caption:
Submission Of Audited Financial Results Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The Securities And
Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 26th May 2022,
inter-alia has approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and
year ended 31st March 2022 along with the Audit Report issued by the Statutory Auditors as per
Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure
Requirements), Regulations, 2015 and the same is attached herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Please find enclosed the transcripts of the Analysts/Investor Meet/ Earnings Call of Q3 of FY 2021-22 held on 09 February 2022.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please be informed that the Presentation and the audio recording of the Earnings call held on February 09, 2022, to discuss the unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine-months ended December 31, 2021 has been uploaded on the website of the Company at https://www.sjsindia.com/

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: In continuation with the Company's letter dated January 31, 2022 pertaining to Intimation of schedule of Earnings call to be held on Wednesday, 9th February 2022 at 10:00 a.m. (IST) and pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith the earnings presentation on the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine-months ended December 31, 2021.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2021
data.news_body: Submission Of Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter Ended 31st December 2021

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: S.J.S. Enterprises Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Board meeting held on February 08, 2022 which concluded at 4.45 p.m. inter-alia has approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2021 along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors as per Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations, 2015
